alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Charlotte and northwestern Lee Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lochmoor Waterway Estates, or near Cape Coral, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Punta Gorda, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, McGregor, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Charlotte County Airport, Pine Manor, Iona, Buckingham, Burnt Store Marina, Tice, Solana, Whiskey Creek, North Fort Myers, Page Field Airport and Tropical Gulf Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
